label: Nut Butters and Spreads
description: A variety of nut-based spreads and butters, including peanut butter, almond butter, and hazelnut spread.
intents: Find and purchase nut butters and spreads
Discover new types of nut butters and spreads
Learn about the health benefits of nut butters and spreads

subcategories.label: Peanut Butter

subcategories.label: Almond Butter
subcategories.description: A spread made from ground almonds.

subcategories.label: Hazelnut Spread
subcategories.description: A spread made from ground hazelnuts and chocolate.

subcategories.label: Cashew Butter
subcategories.description: A spread made from ground cashews.

subcategories.label: Other Nut Butters
subcategories.description: A variety of nut-based spreads and butters beyond peanut, almond, and hazelnut.
